import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography} from '@mui/material' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUpAlt' import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete'; import MoreHorizIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreHoriz' import useStyles from './styles.js'; import moment from 'moment'; const Post = ({post, setCurrentId})=>{ const classes = useStyles(); console.log(post.title); return(
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag)=> `#${tag} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ); } export default Post;
